name: IP FEDERATION
membership: The IP Federation is a member of the CONFEFERATION OF BRITISH INDUSTRY.
goal: representation of the views of UK industry on intellectual property issues.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Customs, Digital economy and society, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
• Unified Patent Court (UPC)
• Unitary Patent (UP)
• Trade secrets directive
